title: Crowley | 99 problems [Good Omens]
author: GossipVal1
comment: still can't get over the fact that crowley's most badass moment was when it was actually aziraphale
david tennant embodies every role he plays perfectly but this one he does even more so than usual

Crowley as a character has been inhabiting my head for 18 years -- one of my all-time favorite book characters. Bringing this character to the screen could have gone so wrong, but David Tennant just totally nailed it. So much swagger.
You are not allowed to make me love this man more than I already do.

“DO SOMETHING!”

“I am having a moment, here.”
